name: Mind Crosser
description:
You control a spirit jumping between bodies in an effort to save a prisoner from an orc dungeon.

Controls

Body Jumping

  • Hold Space key to jump between bodies
  • When jumping the spirit always chooses the nearest body

Influencing

  • Different bodies have different degrees they can be influenced
  • Press Control, C, or V to influence an Orc
  • A particular body (not gonna say which) may be controlled with arrow keys
Hold Space to jump between bodies Press Control, C, or V near a switch to toggle it
Credit

Mind Crosser was made for Godot Wild Jam 2. It has been released under MIT. So you can fork it and make it your own. The repository can be found here: https://github.com/DustinWoods/godot-wild-jam-2.

This game was made in just about a week by these mind crossing game jammers:

  • JohnGabrielUK(Music and Sound) @JohnGabrielUK
  • Zach777(UI and Code)
  • Mago (Art) @magodevel
  • Dustin Woods (Code) @dustinpwoods
  • ... and you? Contribute to open source
